price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߢߍߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߏߌ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߞߊ߬ ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߖߊ߲߬ߞߌ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߘߌ߬؟
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīri
